name: Fire is Hot Hot (Week 1)
description:
WARNING: SOUND

Fire is Hot Hot is a game about a little fire guy that breaths fire by collecting kindling.

This is a game that was supposed to be made in a week (only 2 days for the first week of January), but time and events decided no. First week was Jan 1-2, which wasn't enough time so it turned into an extra two weeks.
